title: Beloved Tyrant - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Arrogant Characters   Beautiful Female Lead   Brainwashing   Cautious Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Confinement   Cruel Characters   Dark   Death   Death of Loved Ones   Depictions of Cruelty   Enemies Become Allies   European Ambience   Fallen Nobility   Fast Learner   Female Protagonist   Incest   Mind Break   Nobles   Past Trauma   Prison   Quiet Characters   Rebellion   Royalty   Servants   S*aves   Stockholm Syndrome   Villainess Noble Girls
author: 건두부
description:
I was the hidden leader of a rebellion.

I took in and enslaved the blue knight, who because of me, would be executed. 

As previously promised, I was about to give him the title of a duke.

“Don’t call me Knight, I’m not a knight. Please don’t even use honorifics with me. I’m not a noble.”

“I am simply Your Highness’ slave.” 

Though he is a broken knight, with him, I must try and rebel once again.>
